fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterUserI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HeaterExternalControlI, HeaterTemperatureI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HeaterUserCI, HeaterUserJava4CI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Heater, HeaterCyPhy, HeaterUserConnector, HeaterUserInboundPort, HeaterUserJava4InboundPort, HeaterUserOutboundPort

    public interface HeaterUserI
extends HeaterExternalControlI
    The interface HeaterUserI declares the signature of the heater component services corresponding to the actions a user can perform on the heater.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • setTargetTemperature

        void setTargetTemperature(fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.Measure<java.lang.Double> target)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        set the target temperature.

        Contract

         pre     target != null && TEMPERATURE_UNIT.equals(target.getMeasurementUnit())
 pre     target.getData() >= MIN_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData() && target.getData() <= MAX_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData()
 post    getTargetTemperature().getMeasure().equals(target)
        Parameters:
